page.title: 04 LAW AND ORDER.
page.content: The policeman for the villages of Hackleton and Denton lives in the police house at Hackleton.His "Beat" includes 10 other villages. In addition to performing the normal duties of an officer of the law he makes sure that all the children know who he is despite covering such a large area.He visits each of the 7 schools in his villages at least once and often many more times in the year. During a recent visit to Denton school some children asked about crime in the area and were given this information:- In 1984 4 cars were stolen 30 cars had property stolen from them (mainly petrol) while 32 houses were broken into and 21 other buildings were entered.He said most of the houses were entered during the day when they were empty but on the whole we were very law abiding.
